Translations.Text: They challenge vos bring retribution DEUS nunquam fails fulfill His prophecy! Feria tuus Dominus est 1000 de tuus annus
Multus community in the elapsus committed malus ego led them on awhile tunc ego punished them. To Me est ultimate destiny
dictus O people ego est sent to vos prout profound warner
Those believe lead righteous vita deserved forgiveness generous recompense
Prout pro those strive challenge noster revelations they incur Hell
Nos non send vos any messenger nor prophet habet devil interfere his wishes DEUS TUNC nullifies QUOD devil PERFECIT. DEUS perfects His revelations. DEUS est Omniscient Wise
He sic sets devil's scheme test those harbor doubts their hearts those hearts hardened wicked must remain opposition
Those beatus knowledge recognize truth tuus Dominus tunc believe in it their hearts readily accept it multus assuredly DEUS guides believers rectus path
Prout pro those disbelieve they continue harbor doubts Hora advenit them suddenly retribution terrible feria advenit them
